general.jobTitle: Full Stack Engineer | Full Stack AI Engineer

hero.heading: a Data Scientist!
hero.description: Transforming business problems using AI solutions

intro.heading: Innovative Problem Solver
intro.description1: I thrive at the intersection of analytical thinking and cutting-edge technology, transforming complex datasets into actionable insights. With expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and graph analytics, I develop intelligent systems that uncover hidden patterns and drive data-informed decision-making.
intro.description2: Whether it's building local LLM-based solutions, designing entity resolution pipelines, or leveraging graph databases for anomaly detection, I bring a unique blend of technical rigor and strategic thinking to every project.

about.heading: Full Stack Engineer passionate about building intelligent, scalable applications that solve real-world problems.
about.description: As a Full Stack AI Engineer, I design and build machine learning models and AI features, develop full stack applications, and integrate AI capabilities into scalable, user-friendly software. My solid academic background in AI, combined with practical full stack engineering experience, drives my passion for delivering innovative, real-world solutions. I am committed to leveraging technology to solve complex problems and create meaningful impact.

projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Innovative solutions that demonstrate my technical expertise and passion for building impactful applications
